msg: updated the Jakarta Commons Logging dependency

author: sullis
msg: This file is from Jakarta Commons-Logging version 1.0.1

author: jsdever
msg: The write(byte[]) was writing directly to the socket without any error checking ... changed this method to call write(byte[], int, int).
Added some error checking to the arguments in HttpConnection write(byte[], int, int).
Fixed the wirelog output in write(byte[], int, int) to only log the range of bytes that will actually be written.

author: jsdever
msg: Added a text mode trival example which was used as a interactive test.

author: sullis
msg: code cleanup, HTTP Get is now asynchronous
